seo.title: Projects
seo.description: Projects we truly stand behind. For every project, customer satisfaction is our priority. Design, animation, and clarity are our standard.

LucieCoRadaFoti.text: A one-page website representing the work of a wedding and family photographer, focused mainly on showcasing her photos. The site allows visitors to easily book a photoshoot through a contact form. The website content can now be updated through our custom admin, which we newly offer to our clients.

DrippyRugs.text: A simple website created to introduce the brand, showcase the work, and offer the option to request a custom product. The site emphasizes maximum simplicity, clean design, and clarity.

Printujto.text: A website focused on custom 3D printing. The site includes a 3D calculator that allows users to submit an order request in a few steps with an automatically calculated price.

SolariumAvantgarda.text: Avantgarda tanning studio located in the center of Olomouc. A custom-made presentation website created specifically for the client.

Habartovi.text: The old design received a brand new look. The project included a complete rebuild and redesign of all content, including a modernized logo. The new design emphasizes clarity and creating fast pages that donâ€™t bore visitors while browsing. Animations were added to bring the design to life. The client also requested keeping certain elements from the original site, so the new web combines a modern approach with older sections that preserve the original atmosphere.
